Tables.name: queue
Tables.description: Messages received by the bot are placed in this table for further processing at the specified time by a separate thread
columns: download_status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'not started',
upload_status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'not started',
timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

Tables.name: processed
Tables.description: After processing from the queue, the record should be moved to this table and enriched with additional data
columns: timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

Tables.name: migrations
Tables.description: Table to store the migration history of the database
columns: timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

Tables.name: messages
Tables.description: The table stores the message ID and the chat ID
columns: timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

Tables.name: users
Tables.description: The table stores the user ID and the chat ID for communication with the bot
